title: Coworking Giant in Venture to Create the Airbnb of Office Space
sub_head: Move comes as demand for furnished office space under short-term leases is gradually recovering from its pandemic low
body:
Entrepreneurs have long sought to create a big online listing site for office space similar to how Booking.com or Airbnb offer lodging options. Now the Covid-19 pandemic is breathing new life into these efforts.
Flexible-office operator IWG PLC. said last week that it is investing around $350 million into a venture with the Instant Group, which runs an online listing site for office space. The companies say the business will be the worldâ€™s largest online marketplace for flexible office space.
